name: The Last Sewer Janitor
description:
You are the last sewage worker.

The city's sewer system is overrun by grime monsters and you are the only one that can save the city's sewer!

Collect trash, repel monsters, upgrade your Janitor's Vacuum, and clean out the sewer.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • (Hold) Left Mouse - Suck
  • Right Mouse - Repel

Cheats:

  • F1 - Lots of money
  • F2 - Lots of health

(This is my first ever finished game. (Well, as "finished" as it can be)

After many failed attempts at making a game (for many years!), I decided to participate the Finally Finish Something (FFS) Game Jam and push myself to finish a game. I started this project at the start of the year 2020, and it has been a good learning experience.

Yeah I know, the game is pretty bad, but whatever, I finally made a game, and that's kinda what I always wanted.

Anyway, if you are bored or crazy enough to spend your precious time on this game ... thank you for playing, hope you enjoy the game one way or another.)

Updates:

2/2/2020 - Updated re-spawn position
